title: problem with connecting into the game
body:
can someone help me with this?
every now and then lol wouldn't let me in the game like I actually join the room and the game starts but I cannot connect and I keep getting disconnected at 0% or 35 %
thank you in advance

replies.body: It seems that your network is having problems specifically connecting to the game server.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection or any settings that may be blocking access.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings just in case.  Let me know if you have any questions.
